description:
When a former demon king and a former hero are reincarnated in a peaceful world, they accidentally begin to fall in love!
Narukami Ryuusei is a NEET by profession. He spends his days hiding and playing video games, but he was actually a demon king in a world other than this one. Here, the hero who once defeated Ryuusei and is now a high school girl, Hanaori Mitya, arrives to visit him...
Source: M-U

titles.title: Hanaori-san wa Tensei Shite mo Kenka ga Shitai
花織さんは転生しても喧嘩がしたい
Even Reincarnated, Hanaori`s Still Spoiling for a Fight
Hanaori-san Wants to Have a Fight Even if She Reincarnates
